LanguageData.AS_AbilityChanceDesc: Determines the probability of a cultivator gaining random scroll arts / abilities when spawned. Slightly below displayed percentage if no useable scrolls are found.
LanguageData.AS_PCChanceDesc: Determines the probability of a random cultivators realm progression being high end when spawned. This only effects thier given realm, so if essence realm chance is at 0 you wont get any truly powerful cultivators.
LanguageData.AS_ERChanceDesc: Determines the probability of random cultivators being in a essence realm when spawned. Essence realms are after body realms.
LanguageData.AS_LogHealsDesc: Enable if you want to log heals from this mod in console. May flood the console if too many heals take place.
LanguageData.AS_CultivatorChanceDesc: Determines the probability of a pawn being a cultivator with random realm progression when spawned.
LanguageData.AS_PIChanceDesc: Determines the probability of a pawn being a Pseudo-Immortal cultivator when spawned, only effects randomly generated cultivators.
LanguageData.AS_CultivationSpeedDesc: The speed at which cultivators do cultivation jobs like Exercise, Refine Qi, Gather Qi, Breakthroughs, etc.
LanguageData.AS_QiTileDesc: The amount of Qi in the cultivators current position. Increases gather qi yield by the same amount and increases cultivation speed by 1/100th the amount.
LanguageData.AS_InnerCDesc: The Inner Cauldron increases a cultivators max Qi by the amount of Qi refined into it.
LanguageData.AS_AnimaCDesc: Inner Cauldron converts into Anima Conversion once a Golden Core is cultivated. Anima Conversion also grants max qi but is uncapped and can be increased indefinitely by cultivating it for long enough.
LanguageData.AS_InnerCJobDesc: Meditate for 6 hours divided by cultivation speed to refine 2 + 2% max qi into the Inner Cauldron to grant more max qi equal to the amount refined if not at the limit.
LanguageData.AS_AnimaCJobDesc: Meditate for 6 hours divided by cultivation speed to convert 2 + 2% max qi into Anima to grant more max qi equal to the amount converted.
LanguageData.AS_RealmAutoDesc: Auto-cultivate Current Realm. (This includes gathering qi if they are in a essence realm)
LanguageData.AS_RealmOnlyAutoDesc: Auto-cultivate Current Realm only. (This excludes gathering qi if they are in a essence realm)
LanguageData.AS_TConversionsLeft: Qi to essence realm progress conversions left.
LanguageData.AS_RefineQiDesc: Meditate for 2 hours divided by cultivation speed to Refine Qi into progress on essence realms. 10% max qi plus 2 qi is used in each refinement, progressing by the same amount of qi used.
LanguageData.AS_ExerciseDesc: Exercise for 4 hours divided by cultivation speed to progress 10 + (1% max progress) in the current body realm.
LanguageData.AS_QiGatheringDesc: Meditate for 3 hours divided by cultivation speed to gather natural qi from your surroundings. Generates 1 qi plus the amount of Gather Qi in the cultivators position.
LanguageData.AS_BreakthroughEssenceDesc: Meditate for 7 hours divided by cultivation speed to breakthrough to the next realm.
LanguageData.AS_BreakthroughBodyDesc: Exercise for 7 hours divided by cultivation speed to breakthrough to the next realm.
LanguageData.AS_GatherQiRangeDesc: How far the object with Gather Qi permeates its surroundings.
LanguageData.AS_GatherQiAmountDesc: The amount of Qi that the object with Gather Qi grants to its surroundings
LanguageData.AS_BodyRealmDec: The current body realm of the cultivator. Body realm cultivation provides enchanced bodily functions, and is needed to surpass the bodies limits of qi storage to progress to the essence realms.(Essence realms start after breakthrough of the last body realm 'Flesh Molding')
LanguageData.AS_EssenceRealmDec: The current essence realm of the cultivator. Essence realm cultivation provides passive qi generation.
LanguageData.AS_CBreakthroughDesc: Meditate for hours to breakthrough to the next tier of Ascendant Foundation or Pseudo-Immortalality.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledNoAFOrPI: Ability disabled, no Ascendant Foundation or Pseudo-Immortality found.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledERProgLow: Ability disabled, Essence Realm not high enough.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledBRProgLow: Ability disabled, Body Realm not high enough.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledPIProgLow: Ability disabled, Pseudo-Immortality tier too low.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledNoQiPool: Ability disabled, no qi pool found.
LanguageData.AbilityDisabledNoQi: Ability disabled, not enough qi in pool.
LanguageData.AS_HumanoidCultivatorDesc: Enable if you want the spawn chance to only affect humanoid pawns.
LanguageData.AS_MachineCultivatorDesc: Enable if you want the spawn chance to affect mechanical pawns. Enabling is not recommended for Biotech users unless you want to randomly gestate pseudo-immortal mechs.
LanguageData.AS_OPGoldenPills: Same Ascendant Foundation Tier As Golden Pill Tier
LanguageData.AS_OPGoldenPillsDesc: DO NOT ENABLE ON "SERIOUS" PLAYTHROUGHS. Enable if you want Golden Pills to give the same tier of Ascendant Foundation as the tier of the Golden Pill. This makes foundation building extremley easy using high tier pills especially since it BYPASSES BREAKTHROUGHS, so it is not recommended for any serious playthough.
